events.name: Gaza crisis following Hamas attack on Israel
events.wd_label: Gaza crisis following Hamas attack on Israel
events.wd_description: The Gaza Strip has experienced a series of bombardments from Israel following an attack by Hamas militants, leading to a full-blown war.
events.description: The Gaza Strip has experienced a series of bombardments from Israel following an attack by Hamas militants, leading to a full-blown war.

events.name: Bombardments
events.wd_description: Gaza has seen continuous bombardments from Israel as part of the retaliatory attacks against Hamas.
events.description: Gaza has seen continuous bombardments from Israel as part of the retaliatory attacks against Hamas.

events.name: Blockade
events.wd_description: Israel has placed Gaza under a total blockade from food, water, fuel, and electricity supply.
events.description: Israel has placed Gaza under a total blockade from food, water, fuel, and electricity supply.

events.name: Humanitarian crisis
events.wd_description: Gaza is running out of fuel for generators, affecting healthcare facilities and services for over 50,000 pregnant women, and over 1.1 million people have been instructed to move south.
events.description: Gaza is running out of fuel for generators, affecting healthcare facilities and services for over 50,000 pregnant women, and over 1.1 million people have been instructed to move south.

events.name: Israel declares war on Hamas
events.wd_description: Israel has officially declared war on Hamas, leading to a major military operation in Gaza following a surprise attack by Hamas that killed over 700 Israelis.
events.description: Israel has officially declared war on Hamas, leading to a major military operation in Gaza following a surprise attack by Hamas that killed over 700 Israelis.

events.name: Military operation in Gaza
events.wd_description: Tanks and personnel carriers were sighted on the move along the Israel-Gaza border as part of the military response.
events.description: Tanks and personnel carriers were sighted on the move along the Israel-Gaza border as part of the military response.

events.name: Hostage situation
events.wd_description: Hamas and the Islamist Jihad have confirmed holding over 130 Israeli hostages, including high-ranking officers, as they continue to fire rockets into Israel.
events.description: Hamas and the Islamist Jihad have confirmed holding over 130 Israeli hostages, including high-ranking officers, as they continue to fire rockets into Israel.

events.name: Netanyahu's response
events.wd_description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu promised retaliation and stated that the country is ready for a long and difficult war.
events.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu promised retaliation and stated that the country is ready for a long and difficult war.

events.name: US Sends Seized Ammunition to Ukraine
events.wd_label: US Sends Seized Ammunition to Ukraine
events.wd_description: The US confirmed sending over 1 million rounds of ammunition seized from Iran to Ukraine, although it may not significantly impact the battlefield.
events.description: The US confirmed sending over 1 million rounds of ammunition seized from Iran to Ukraine, although it may not significantly impact the battlefield.

events.name: Ammunition Details
events.wd_description: The US Central Command confirmed sending close to 1.1 million 7.62 mm rounds to Ukraine.
events.description: The US Central Command confirmed sending close to 1.1 million 7.62 mm rounds to Ukraine.

events.name: Interceptions by US Navy
events.wd_description: The US naval forces have been intercepting vessels and seizing weapons from Iran, believed to be bound for Iran-backed fighters in Yemen.
events.description: The US naval forces have been intercepting vessels and seizing weapons from Iran, believed to be bound for Iran-backed fighters in Yemen.

events.name: Ukraine's Weapon Needs
events.wd_description: The ammunition is unlikely to make a major difference for Ukraine, which needs long-range weapons and air defense systems.
events.description: The ammunition is unlikely to make a major difference for Ukraine, which needs long-range weapons and air defense systems.

events.name: Congressional Funding Status
events.wd_description: Congress did not include new funding for Ukraine in the recent stopgap US spending bill.
events.description: Congress did not include new funding for Ukraine in the recent stopgap US spending bill.

events.name: Beijing's restriction on graphite exports
events.wd_description: Beijing's move to restrict graphite exports will impact foreign makers of EV battery components, especially those not using synthetic materials as extensively as Chinese manufacturers.
events.description: Beijing's move to restrict graphite exports will impact foreign makers of EV battery components, especially those not using synthetic materials as extensively as Chinese manufacturers.

events.name: Impact on global EV supply chain
events.wd_label: Impact on global EV supply chain
events.wd_description: China's limit on critical mineral exports has fueled uncertainty in the global EV supply chain since the announcement.
events.description: China's limit on critical mineral exports has fueled uncertainty in the global EV supply chain since the announcement.

events.name: Synthetic vs natural graphite use
events.wd_description: Some Chinese manufacturers expect limited impact from the rules as most EV batteries they make use a grade of synthetic material unaffected by the curbs.
events.description: Some Chinese manufacturers expect limited impact from the rules as most EV batteries they make use a grade of synthetic material unaffected by the curbs.

events.name: Export permits requirement
events.wd_description: China will require export permits starting Dec. 1 for high-end synthetic graphite and key forms of natural graphite.
events.description: China will require export permits starting Dec. 1 for high-end synthetic graphite and key forms of natural graphite.

events.name: Industry reactions
events.wd_description: Executives in China and globally are seeking clarity on the new measures, with some expecting inconvenience in the exporting process.
events.description: Executives in China and globally are seeking clarity on the new measures, with some expecting inconvenience in the exporting process.

events.name: China's synthetic graphite production
events.wd_description: Chinese companies, which have been building overseas plants, said the restrictions will have little effect on their operations abroad due to their use of synthetic graphite.
events.description: Chinese companies, which have been building overseas plants, said the restrictions will have little effect on their operations abroad due to their use of synthetic graphite.

events.name: Natural graphite impact
events.wd_description: Global companies using natural graphite include Hitachi Chemical, POSCO Future M, and Mitsubishi Chemical, with varying responses to the new rules.
events.description: Global companies using natural graphite include Hitachi Chemical, POSCO Future M, and Mitsubishi Chemical, with varying responses to the new rules.

events.name: Responses from other companies
events.wd_description: Companies like Syrah Resources and India's Epsilon Advanced Materials are planning to step up purchases of natural graphite and develop synthetic graphite locally in response to the restrictions.
events.description: Companies like Syrah Resources and India's Epsilon Advanced Materials are planning to step up purchases of natural graphite and develop synthetic graphite locally in response to the restrictions.
